rows.label: tlk41300021_03_msg0001
rows.name:
I hear Superbia almost started
another war.

rows.label: tlk41300021_03_msg0002
rows.name:
But it turned out Iira was behind
everything. I'm just glad the conflict
was stopped before it was too late.

rows.label: tlk41300021_03_msg0003
rows.name:
If war were to really break out,
I don't doubt Invidia would make
Gula a target.

rows.label: tlk41300021_03_msg0004
rows.name:
And this city, with its large military
base, could easily become a battlefield.

rows.label: tlk41300021_03_msg0005
rows.name:
I would hate to see Trigo razed
to the ground like the White Chair,
city of my ancestors.

rows.label: tlk41300021_03_msg0006
rows.name:
A ceasefire is the best outcome
we Gulan can hope for.
